comments.en:
Multi-function printer-scanner-fax-copier.

For basic printing functionality use the pxlmono or the PostScript PPD, note that this printer does not support PostScript by default, so the PostScript PPD will only work if the optional PostScript module is installed.

For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Stand-alone copying should just work, it does not need the PC.

Consumables/Refills: UltraPrecise Print Cartridge C4092A, ~$60
